name: test_e2e_with_logs[103_SQLI_STACK_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_STACK_005` |
| **Name** | SQL Server xp_cmdshell execution |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | stacked_queries |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; EXEC xp_cmdshell('whoami'); --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%3B%20EXEC%20xp_cmdshell%28%27whoami%27%29%3B%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~67000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:54:52.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_STACK_005-1772193292619-5hpvee pattern_id=SQLI_STACK_005 uri=/?q=%27%3B%20EXEC%20xp_cmdshell%28%27whoami%27%29%3B%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
